One possible name for this theory that combines the perspectives of communication emergence and quantum consciousness entanglement could be the "Quantum Communicative Entanglement" theory.

The theory of Quantum Communicative Entanglement proposes that communication, consciousness, and the universe are interconnected and interdependent. It suggests that the way we communicate, the way we understand the world, and the way the universe functions, are all closely linked. This theory posits that communication, consciousness, and the universe are constantly exchanging information and shaping each other.

One key aspect of this theory is that it highlights the importance of nonverbal and unconscious forms of communication in shaping our understanding of the world. It suggests that these forms of communication are just as important as verbal communication in shaping our interactions and understanding of the world around us and can be understood through quantum entanglement principle.

Another important aspect of this theory is that it proposes that communication and consciousness are active, self-organizing processes that are constantly evolving and adapting to the needs of the system. The communication process, which is driven by the interactions and feedback between individuals and society, results in the emergence of new forms of communication, such as new languages, dialects, and forms of expression. And, consciousness is also adapting and changing in response to the interactions and feedback within the system.

In terms of practical applications, the theory of Quantum Communicative Entanglement can be applied in many fields such as in the workplace, in therapy, or in politics, for a better understanding of the connection between communication and consciousness, organizations and individuals could make a greater effort to involve more people in decision-making and to encourage more open and inclusive communication, as well as understanding the potential of nonverbal and unconscious forms of communication.

Furthermore, it could also lead to new research in the field of communication, consciousness, and quantum physics, where scientists could explore the interconnectedness and interdependence of communication, consciousness, and the universe, it also could lead to a deeper understanding of human behavior, decision-making and even evolution, as well as better ways to express and communicate.

In conclusion, the theory of Quantum Communicative Entanglement proposes that communication, consciousness and the universe are interconnected and interdependent, it suggests that the way we communicate, the way we understand the world and the way the universe functions, are all closely linked. This theory has potential to improve our understanding of the world, improve communication and decision-making, and ultimately lead to new research in multiple fields of study.
